statements: DELETE FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND start_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE company_name = 'Tech Co' AND campaign_type = 'Social Media Marketing'
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Social Media' AND start_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM campaign WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale';
DELETE FROM partnership WHERE influencer_id = 3 AND campaign_id = 5;
DELETE FROM partnership WHERE influencer_id = 1 AND campaign_id = 2;
DELETE FROM collaboration WHERE engagement_rate > 0.05 AND campaign_id = 3;
